channel.title: This might help.. :S (How to make it not crash if they click alot)(GoodCoders)
channel.description: Ok.. Don't know much.. Yet I do know that the reason it crashes when people click fast or ice barrage too much is because of the Perimeters.. Change those till they work.. But since im a complete idiot (I already admitted to it) I can't do it. Anyone wana try? :|

item.title: This might help.. :S (How to make it not crash if they click alot)(GoodCoders)
item.dc:creator: @adam2348 adam2348
item.description:
@adam2348 wrote:

ur server should have something like actionamount++ when u do certain things, and in process it should check to see if actionamount is over a certain amount, change that amount. lets say u set that amount to 4, and we know that process runs every 500msec, and every time it runs if it’s not 4 it subtracts 1. then if u click an average of higher than 2 times a second, then u will be kicked for acting too fast. it shouldn’t crash ur server, cuz it kicks them before it can lag u. i set mine higher than 4 so that i can pick flax faster, hehe. if u need more technical help than that, then tell me, i’ll give u code to search for and stuff in client.java or clienthandler.java (for hybridscape users like me ;D)

p.s. jagex did it by having uber server hosts

Read full topic
item.source: This might help.. :S (How to make it not crash if they click alot)(GoodCoders)

item.title: This might help.. :S (How to make it not crash if they click alot)(GoodCoders)
item.dc:creator: @Not_Pwnd Not Pwnd
item.description:
@Not_Pwnd wrote:

I think thats how you spell Peremeters or Piremeters or Perimeters… It’s just a coding thing that I don’t know but I do know that if they are off by a little some things can lag your server down by clicking quickly.

Of course Jagex has 2,000 people clicking every .1 seconds so they hit that spot bullseye…

Read full topic
